page.title: 08SOPHIE C.- A day in the life
page.content: Hello - my name is Sophie Conolly and I'm twelve. I live with my parents and two brothers in Cockshott Lane, Frox- -field.A typical Sunday for me starts when I get up and breakfast on the balcony with the family.If it's a fine morning,I might stay outside and read or draw. We might lunch outside unless it looks like rain.One day I went with my brothers for a bike ride in the lanes near our house.On another day we went to the Steep Fete.Last Sunday,our neighbour Eva Barnsley dropped by with some flowers for us,and stayed to tea. I did some prep & played cards before supper-spaghetti bolognese and fruit. Afterwards we began a game of Trivial Pursuit.It ended with Peter being sent to bed & Jonathan having to get ready to return to boarding school.I watched TV for a bit & went to bed at 8.45pm. School tomorrow - ugh!
